column2:
"I've done many missions,
but sometimes I'd use a weapon
I wasn't good with to challenge myself."

"The sooner you start pushing your boundaries,
the better. This goes for the weapons you use,
as well as everything else in life."

"私も多くの任務に従事したが
時にはわざと苦手な武器を使って
自分を追い込みもした。"
"苦手意識は早めに振り払いたまえ！"
